documentation.short: A general dynamic memory pool component.
MainC is the system interface the TinyOS boot sequence.
Component for doing compile-time address allocation.
documentation.long:
Component for doing compile-time address allocation. Wired by the stack, sets a static address based on IN6_PREFIX and TOS_NODE_ID on boot. Useful for development or of you want to hard-code addresses.
@author Stephen Dawson-Haggerty <stevedh@eecs.berkeley.edu>

documentation.short: Forwarding abstractions for blip IPv6 stack.
